solidstack.query
Class QueryManager

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.query.QueryManager

public class QueryManager
extends Object

Reads, compiles and caches the queries. Usage: 

    Map args = new HashMap();
    args.put("arg1", arg1);
    args.put("arg2", arg2);
    Query query = queryManager.bind("path/filename", args);
    List> result = query.listOfMaps(connection);

The bind(String, Map) call looks in the classpath for a file 'path/filename.gsql' in the package configured with setPackage(String).

The arguments in the map given to the bind call can be any type as long as the template produces something that the JDBC driver understands.

See Query for a description of what you can do with the query returned by the bind call.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

setPackage

public void setPackage(String pkg)

setReloading

public void setReloading(boolean reloading)
Enable or disable reloading. When enabled, the lastModified time stamp of the file is used to check if it needs reloading.

Parameters:
reloading - When true, the file is reloaded when updated.
